mosinstall.name: VirtueMart Frontpage Categories
mosinstall.author: PoweredbyVirtuemart
mosinstall.description: Display your categories and subcategories in a module with a lot of control.

param.name: num_columns
param.label: How many columns?
param.description: You can specify how many columns you want to display.

param.name: mod_height
param.label: Specify the height of the module
param.description: You can specify the height of the module div container.

param.name: mod_width
param.label: Specify the width of the module
param.description: You can specify the width of the module div container.

param.name: cat_height
param.label: Specify the height of the category display
param.description: You can specify the height of the category div container.

param.name: image_width
param.label: Specify the width of the category image
param.description: You can specify the width of the category image.

param.name: sub_categories_display
param.label: Number of sub-categories to display
param.description: You can specify the depth of the sub-categories you want to display.
